table.caption: Dragonscarred Blessings
rows: You bear a facial scar in the shape of a dragon.
You have vestigial dragon horns, vestigial wings, or a vestigial tail.
Your eyes have slitted pupils and vividly colored irises.
Parts of your skin are covered in patches of reptilian scales.
A flame crackles inside your chest, and you exhale bits of ash with every breath.
You crave and can digest foods your species would normally find inedible, such as whole eggs, raw poultry, dirt, or bones.
Your hair stands on end and crackles with static electricity.
table.name: Marked by the Dragon; Dragonscarred Blessings
